lines.text: I heard some music tonight. Something they call 'jazz.' The fellows just make it up as they go along. They pick it out of the air.
...trying to make songs out of music I picked up. Music nobody ever heard of before, but the only kind I want to sing.
Broadway? What a street! You know something, baby? It belongs to me. You know something else? If you want, I'll give it to you.
